typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT as string,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM as string,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE as string,
		BASE_AIR_PORT as string,
		CRGO_WGT as string,
		ESTD_ARRVL as string,
		ESTD_DPTR as string,
		FLT_DT as string,
		FLT_ID as integer,
		FLT_NUM as string,
		FLT_TYPE as string,
		FUEL_IN as double,
		FUEL_OUT as double,
		FUEL_UPLIFT as integer,
		IS_CNCLD as boolean,
		IS_VERFD as boolean,
		MAINT_LOG_PG as integer,
		NOTES as string,
		SCHDD_ARRVL as string,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		UPDTD_AT as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StgFlights
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
StgFlights split(isNull(FLT_DT) || isNull(FLT_ID) || isNull(FLT_NUM) || isNull(FLT_TYPE) || isNull(SCHDD_DPTR) || isNull(UPDTD_AT) ||
iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_IN), false(), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_ON), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OUT), false(), ACTL_OOOI_IN>ACTL_OOOI_OUT), ACTL_OOOI_IN<ACTL_OOOI_ON)) || 
iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OFF), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_ON), false(),true()), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OUT), false(), ACTL_OOOI_OFF<ACTL_OOOI_OUT)) ||
iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_ON), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_IN), false(), true()), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_IN), false(), ACTL_OOOI_ON<ACTL_OOOI_OFF)) ||
iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OUT), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OFF), false(), true()), false()) ||
iif(isNull(ESTD_ARRVL), iif(isNull(ESTD_DPTR), false(), true()), ESTD_ARRVL<ESTD_DPTR) ||
iif(isNull(SCHDD_ARRVL), true(), SCHDD_ARRVL<SCHDD_DPTR)
,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Reject, FilterData)
